Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The two other siblings , apparently healthy at 12 ( 1 / 2 ) and 15 years , respectively , and their father , apparently healthy as well , presented ARSA and GS values within the range of MLD patients .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| MLD (Mucopolysaccharidosis type A) |

The paragraph mentions that the two siblings and their father presented ARSA and GS values within the range of MLD patients. Therefore, MLD is the identified disease entity in the paragraph.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Mucopolysaccharidosis type A (MLD) |

The paragraph mentions that the individuals presented ARSA and GS values within the range of MLD patients. Therefore, MLD is the identified disease entity in the paragraph. Other entities such as "apparently healthy" and "respectively" do not refer to diseases.
